text: Family, amirite? Everyone knows that the people we love the most are the ones who can — and usually do — drive us crazier than anyone else on earth. It ’ s inexplicable and irrational, but it ’ s one of life ’ s many cosmic truths. With all this said, I have a confession to make : Lately, This is Us is working my last nerve. Before you start gathering your pitchforks and torches, hear me out. This is Us is a very good show, and it deserves to be the hit that it is. The brilliance of its structure — telling the story of the Pearson family over past, present, and future timelines — allows the writers to illustrate our changing perspectives about family in a uniquely affecting way.
